main event: On June 30, 1957, in Newport Beach, California, a ground-visual observation reported a round, light yellow object standing still, then moving rapidly in a southeast direction until it disappeared from sight.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15 minutes without sound or further detailed description.
Another observation on July 6, 1957, in San Pedro, California, reported visual contact with a fast and high altitude UFO observed for a few seconds before going out of sight.
Despite the presence of a helicopter in the area, no sound was heard during the sighting, adding to the mystery.
No detailed description of the UFO's appearance or behavior was provided, leaving the sightings unexplained.
The report was delivered by a civilian to the Central Dispatch in New Mexico.
sighted object: round, light yellow object (June 30, 1957), fast and high altitude UFO (July 6, 1957)
location: Newport Beach, California (June 30, 1957), San Pedro, California (July 6, 1957)
